Hello!

Sorry for the delay -- was off at Disney World and let our mail get behind :)

I haven't heard anything from the few folks working on map conglomerations, 
so I'm not sure of the status :( Of course, anyone interested is welcome to 
put up anything they have; I'll happily send the various maps we've 
received as well to help the collection :)

--Tom
